TopicTitle: JAGER-MAN Industries - Aerial Refueling in Vanilla Kerbal - Proof of Concept

Articles.Content:
JAGER-MAN Industries introduces our first proof-of-concept in mid-air coupling/refueling. Only a minimal amount of fuel was transferred in this test but after repeated successful attempts, it can be done!

No screenshots because they just simply wouldn't do this experience justice XD

I plan on doing a separate video/album and post of craft files on our upcoming "Airliners" fleet in the near future, by the way.
Now add an IR controlled hinged boom (with winglets), maybe a hull camera, and it will be just like a real KC-10!
